medical_history.chief_complaint: Mild abdominal pain and nausea, intensified in the lower left quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began a few weeks ago with mild abdominal pain, and over the past few days, the pain intensified with associated nausea. Patient reports stopping breakfast due to abdominal pain and nausea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recurrent large cell lymphoma status post nonmyeloblative allogeneic stem cell transplant, paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, pulmonary embolism, low testosterone, GERD, rectal hemorrhoids, sleep apnea on CPAP, elevated LFTs, elevated CPK.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with ovarian cancer; brother died of esophageal cancer.
